reviews.text: Buen lugar para pasarla en tranquilidad.

First time visiting to this location.  Also, my first time trying these kind of treats and it did not disappoint. I got the mangoneado, delicious! They have many ice cream, smoothies, milkshakes and fruit snack options.

Came in for a treat on my lunch break! What a cute place, has ice cream and paletas and so many fun shakes. Tried a mangoneada which did not disappoint! So yum. No one was there when I walked in but there are a bunch of tables available and the cutest high chairs I‚Äôve ever seen. Service was good & quick. Would definitely come back for dessert and look forward to bringing my kids to try this place.
